expo.name: Shelter Cluster
expo.description: Mobile app for the Shelter Cluster

infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allows you to add Shelter Cluster events to your calendar
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allows you to take pictures to upload to Shelter Cluster forms
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allows you to add contacts from Shelter Cluster to your phone
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allows you to select your location in Shelter Cluster forms
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allows you to select images from your phone to upload to Shelter Cluster forms
